name: cypress_framework_typescript
description: Cypress framework with typescript to automate web.

scripts.docker-mac: docker pull cypress/included && docker run -it -v $PWD:/tests -w /tests cypress/included --browser chrome --spec cypress/tests/admin_panel
scripts.docker-win: docker pull cypress/included && docker run -it -v '%cd%':/tests -w /tests cypress/included --browser chrome --spec cypress/tests/admin_panel

author: Sagar Vaghela
